name: inactive utility robot
description: A utility robot, used to automate easily laborous and simple activities that no longer humans're paid for. This robot is standing inactive but ready to be turn on.

name: inactive butler robot
description: A luxury edition of the utility robot, manufacture with a integrated AI core capable of talking, learn cooking recipes by itself and detect simple signs of it owner to known the desires, emotions and status of it and responde properly. This last carasteristic made this robot quite controversial but those who owned claim that they were extremly pleased of how useful, careful and gentle this robot can be.

name: inactive construction robot
description: A robot made on mass to automate dangerous jobs like mining and construction, manufacture with a integrated welder, electric jackhammer, flashlight and a nail gun. This robot was around a lot of controversies for the automation of low-wage jobs that in the last decade most of human workers didn't have the will to work on that type of job for the low wage.

name: inactive firefighter robot
description: A emergency robot prepare to withstand extreme temperatures that no human with the best gear can tolerate. Equip with a integrated watercannon and a thick layer of nomex sheets around painted in red and black. Respected and usually found as a symbol of how robots could help humanity until a mad engineer built a weaponized version that ignites a welded sword on fire.

name: inactive roomba
description: a roomba, mass produce in great quantities since 2002. A floor cleaner that automatically recharges itself, not too useful now in the cataclysm except for those who like to have their floors clean.
